verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w called|strong="G2822"\w* \add to be\add* an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w*, \w separated|strong="G0873"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

(\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* he had promised \w afore|strong="G4279"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*,)

\w Concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* Jesus Christ our Lord, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*;

And \w declared|strong="G3724"\w* \add to be\add* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w holiness|strong="G0042"\w*, \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* from the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*:

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we have \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w apostleship|strong="G0651"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* to the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*:

\w Among|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w called|strong="G2822"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

To \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w be|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*, \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w called|strong="G2822"\w* \add to be\add* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w First|strong="G4412"\w*, I \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* is spoken \w of|strong="G2605"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1722"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w that|strong="G5613"\w* without \w ceasing|strong="G0089"\w* I \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w mention|strong="G3417"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* always in my prayers;

Making \w request|strong="G1189"\w*, if by any \w means|strong="G1513"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* at \w length|strong="G4218"\w* I might have a prosperous \w journey|strong="G2137"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w long|strong="G1971"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may \w impart|strong="G3330"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w gift|strong="G5486"\w*, to the \w end|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may be \w established|strong="G4741"\w*;

\w That|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, that I may be comforted \w together|strong="G4837"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w mutual|strong="G0240"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w have|strong="G0050"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w oftentimes|strong="G4178"\w* I \w purposed|strong="G4388"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, (\w but|strong="G2532"\w* was \w let|strong="G2967"\w* \w hitherto|strong="G0891"\w*,) \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I might \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w debtor|strong="G3781"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* to the \w Barbarians|strong="G0915"\w*; \w both|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* to the \w unwise|strong="G0453"\w*.

So, as much \w as|strong="G3779"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w* \w is|strong="G2596"\w*, I am \w ready|strong="G4289"\w* to preach the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w am|strong="G1870"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G1870"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* to every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w*; to the \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w therein|strong="G1722"\w* \w is|strong="G0601"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, The \w just|strong="G1342"\w* shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w ungodliness|strong="G0763"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w hold|strong="G2722"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*;

\w Because|strong="G1360"\w* that which may be \w known|strong="G1110"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5318"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w shewed|strong="G5319"\w* \add it\add* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the invisible \w things|strong="G0517"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w creation|strong="G2937"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* are clearly \w seen|strong="G2529"\w*, being \w understood|strong="G3539"\w* by the things that are \w made|strong="G4161"\w*, \add even\add* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0126"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Godhead|strong="G2305"\w*; so \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G1511"\w* without \w excuse|strong="G0379"\w*:

Because \w that|strong="G1360"\w*, when they \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, they \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \add him\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2228"\w* were \w thankful|strong="G2168"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* became \w vain|strong="G3154"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w imaginations|strong="G1261"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w foolish|strong="G0801"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* was \w darkened|strong="G4654"\w*.
Professing \w themselves|strong="G5335"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*, they became \w fools|strong="G3471"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w changed|strong="G0236"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of the \w uncorruptible|strong="G0862"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* an \w image|strong="G1504"\w* made like \w to|strong="G3667"\w* \w corruptible|strong="G5349"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w birds|strong="G4071"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fourfooted \w beasts|strong="G5074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* creeping \w things|strong="G2062"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* of their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, to \w dishonour|strong="G0818"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w between|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w* \w changed|strong="G3337"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* a \w lie|strong="G5579"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4573"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w served|strong="G3000"\w* the \w creature|strong="G2937"\w* more \w than|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Creator|strong="G2936"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2128"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w cause|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w vile|strong="G0819"\w* \w affections|strong="G3806"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G5037"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w women|strong="G2338"\w* did \w change|strong="G3337"\w* the \w natural|strong="G5446"\w* \w use|strong="G5540"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* that which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w against|strong="G3844"\w* \w nature|strong="G5449"\w*:

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w men|strong="G0730"\w*, \w leaving|strong="G3588"\w* the \w natural|strong="G5540"\w* \w use|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w woman|strong="G1572"\w*, \w burned|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G3588"\w* \w their|strong="G1519"\w* \w lust|strong="G0846"\w* \w one|strong="G0730"\w* \w toward|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0730"\w*; \w men|strong="G1722"\w* \w with|strong="G0730"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w working|strong="G2532"\w* that which is \w unseemly|strong="G2716"\w*, \w and|strong="G3588"\w* \w receiving|strong="G0618"\w* \w in|strong="G1438"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0618"\w* that \w recompence|strong="G3739"\w* of \w their|strong="G1722"\w* \w error|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G1163"\w* was \w meet|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* they \w did|strong="G1381"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w like|strong="G1381"\w* to \w retain|strong="G2192"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add their\add* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* a \w reprobate|strong="G0096"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*, to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* those \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which \w are|strong="G2520"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w convenient|strong="G2520"\w*;

Being filled \w with|strong="G4137"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*, \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w wickedness|strong="G4189"\w*, \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*, \w maliciousness|strong="G2549"\w*; \w full|strong="G3324"\w* of \w envy|strong="G5355"\w*, \w murder|strong="G5408"\w*, \w debate|strong="G2054"\w*, \w deceit|strong="G1388"\w*, \w malignity|strong="G2550"\w*; \w whisperers|strong="G5588"\w*,

\w Backbiters|strong="G2637"\w*, haters of \w God|strong="G2319"\w*, \w despiteful|strong="G5197"\w*, \w proud|strong="G5244"\w*, \w boasters|strong="G0213"\w*, \w inventors|strong="G2182"\w* of evil \w things|strong="G2556"\w*, \w disobedient|strong="G0545"\w* to \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*,
Without \w understanding|strong="G0801"\w*, \w covenantbreakers|strong="G0802"\w*, without natural \w affection|strong="G0794"\w*, \w implacable|strong="G0786"\w*, \w unmerciful|strong="G0415"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1921"\w* the \w judgment|strong="G1345"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w commit|strong="G4238"\w* such \w things|strong="G5108"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* have pleasure \w in|strong="G4909"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* do \w them|strong="G4238"\w*.
